dev_website_endpoint.description: HTTP endpoint for S3 static website hosting (dev).

development_iam_role_arn.description: Set this as GitHub secret DEVELOPMENT_IAM_ROLE_ARN.

integration_iam_role_arn.description: Set this as GitHub secret INTEGRATION_IAM_ROLE_ARN (PR deploy workflows).

prod_website_endpoint.description: HTTP endpoint for S3 static website hosting (prod).

production_iam_role_arn.description: Set this as GitHub secret PRODUCTION_IAM_ROLE_ARN.

artifact_bucket_name.description: S3 bucket used to store MkDocs build archives (referenced by Makefile/workflows).

dev_site_bucket_name.description: S3 bucket name for the development static website (S3 website hosting endpoint).

enable_pr_buckets.description: Whether to create a limited number of PR buckets (for demo). If false, only dev/prod buckets are created.

github_oidc_thumbprints.description: Thumbprints for the GitHub OIDC provider. GitHub currently uses a well-known root CA; keep configurable.

github_org.description: GitHub organization/user that owns the repository. Used in OIDC trust policy.

github_repo.description: GitHub repository name. Used in OIDC trust policy.

pr_bucket_count.description: How many PR buckets to create when enable_pr_buckets=true.

pr_prefix.description: Prefix for per-PR temporary website buckets.

prod_site_bucket_name.description: S3 bucket name for the production static website (S3 website hosting endpoint).

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for tagging and resource naming.

tags.description: Tags applied to all resources via provider default_tags.
